column4: I want to install grub version 0.97-11ubuntu14 on my edgy system, but when I do "apt-get install grub=0.97-11ubuntu14" it says it cant find it.  How do I do what I want?
try downloading the deb and installing using 'sudo dpkg -i file.deb'
I trid that, but it has a libc dependency.
ah, so you'll need to compile from source
